# mouthClose

**Type Property**

The coefficient describing closure of the lips *independent of jaw position*.

## Declaration

```swift
static let mouthClose: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
```

## Discussion

This coefficient describes a closing of the lips without relation to the position of the jaw (the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/jawOpen] coefficient), so some values of the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/mouthClose] coefficient can produce unrealistic facial expressions unless other coefficients are also set to realistic values.

The figure below shows a face geometry (see [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNFaceGeometry]) in three states:

1. A neutral face (all [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation] coefficient values at `0.0`, including both [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/jawOpen] and [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/mouthClose])
2. Setting only the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/jawOpen] coefficient to `1.0`, while keeping all other coefficient values (including [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/mouthClose]) at `0.0`
3. Setting both the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/jawOpen] and [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation/mouthClose] coefficients to `1.0`, while keeping all other coefficient values at `0.0`



## Mouth and Jaw

- **jawForward**: The coefficient describing forward movement of the lower jaw.
- **jawLeft**: The coefficient describing leftward movement of the lower jaw.
- **jawRight**: The coefficient describing rightward movement of the lower jaw.
- **jawOpen**: The coefficient describing an opening of the lower jaw.
- **mouthFunnel**: The coefficient describing contraction of both lips into an open shape.
- **mouthPucker**: The coefficient describing contraction and compression of both closed lips.
- **mouthLeft**: The coefficient describing leftward movement of both lips together.
- **mouthRight**: The coefficient describing rightward movement of both lips together.
- **mouthSmileLeft**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the left corner of the mouth.
- **mouthSmileRight**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the right corner of the mouth.
- **mouthFrownLeft**: The coefficient describing downward movement of the left corner of the mouth.
- **mouthFrownRight**: The coefficient describing downward movement of the right corner of the mouth.
- **mouthDimpleLeft**: The coefficient describing backward movement of the left corner of the mouth.
- **mouthDimpleRight**: The coefficient describing backward movement of the right corner of the mouth.
- **mouthStretchLeft**: The coefficient describing leftward movement of the left corner of the mouth.
